Verses: 1 yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Arasaalath Thuvakkina Naalaamvarusham Aindhaam Maadhaththile, Asoorin Kumaaranaagiya Ananiyaa Ennappatta Kibiyon Ooraanaagiya Theerkkadharisi Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Aasaariyargalum Sagala Janangalum Paarththirukka Ennai Nokki:
2 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Baabilon Raajaavin Nugaththai Muriththen.

3 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ivvidaththilirundhu Eduththu Baabilonukkuk Kondupona Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Panimuttugalaiyellaam Naan Irandu Varushakaalaththile Ivvidaththukkuth Thirumbakkonduvarappannuven.

4 yoyaakkeemin Kumaaranaagiya Ekoniyaa Engira Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavaiyum Baabilonukku Siraiyaagak Kondupogappatta Yoodhar Anaivaraiyum Naan Ivvidaththukkuth Thirumbivarappannuven; Baabilon Raajaavin Nugaththai Udaippen Endraar Endru Sonnaan.
5 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Aasaariyargal Paarththirukkavum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Nindrirundha Janangalellaarum Paarththirukkavum Ananiyaa Theerkkadharisiyai Nokki:

6 aamen, Karththar Appadiye Seyvaaraaga; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Panimuttugalaiyum Siraippattuppona Anaivaraiyum Baabilonilirundhu Thirumbivarappannuvaar Endru Nee Theerkkadharisanamaaga Sonna Un Vaarththaigalaik Karththar Niraivetruvaaraaga.
7 aagilum, Un Sevigalum Sagala Janaththin Sevigalum Ketka Naan Sollum Vaarththaiyaik Kel.

8 poorvakaalamudhal Enakku Munnum Unakku Munnum Irundha Theerkkadharisigal Anegam Dhesangalukku Virodhamaagavum, Periya Raajyangalukku Virodhamaagavum, Yuththaththaiyum Panjaththaiyum Kollainoyaiyum Kuriththuth Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaargal.

9 samaadhaanam Varum Endru Theerkkadharisi Theerkkadharisanam Solliyirukka, Andhath Theerkkadharisi Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye Vandhaal, Appozhudhu Avan Karththar Meyyaai Anuppina Theerkkadharisiyaaga Vilanguvaanendru Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Sonnaan.
10 appozhudhu Ananiyaa Engira Theerkkadharisi Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyin Kazhuththilirundha Nugaththai Eduththu Adhai Udaiththuppottaan.

11 pinbu Ananiyaa Sagala Janangalukku Munbaagavum: Indhappragaaramaaga Irandu Varushakaalaththile Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarudaiya Nugaththai Sagala Jaadhigalin Kazhuththilumirundhu Vilaga Udaiththuppoduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan. Appozhudhu Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Than Vazhiyeponaan.
12 ananiyaa Engira Theerkkadharisi Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyin Kazhuththilirundha Nugaththai Udaiththuppottapirpaadu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Eremiyaavukku Undaagi, Avar:
13 nee Poi, Ananiyaavai Nokki: Nee Mara Nugaththai Udaiththaai; Adharkuppadhilaaga Iruppu Nugaththai Undupannu Endru Karththar Sonnaar.

14 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarai Sevikkumpadikku Iruppu Nugaththai Indha Ellaa Jaadhigaludaiya Kazhuththinmelum Potten; Avargal Avanai Sevippaargal. Veliyin Mirugajeevangalaiyum Avanukku Oppukkoduththen Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
15 pinbu Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Ananiyaa Engira Theerkkadharisiyai Nokki: Ippodhum Ananiyaave, Kel, Karththar Unnai Anuppinadhillai; Neeyo Indha Janaththaip Poiyai Nambumpadi Seydhaai.
16 aagaiyaal, Idho, Unnai Boomiyinmel Iraadhapadikku Agatrividuven; Indha Varushaththile Nee Saavaai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Karththarukkuvirodhamaaik Kalagam Undaagap Pesinaaye Endraan.
17 appadiye Ananiyaa Engira Theerkkadharisi Avvarushaththiledhaane Ezhaam Maadhaththil Seththupponaan.
